mapper.select: SELECT wh_code FROM warehouse ORDER BY wh_code desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO warehouse (wh_code, wh_name, wh_type, wh_loacation, wh_phone, wh_status, prod_code, raw_code, emp_num, wh_note) VALUES (#{wh_code}, #{wh_name}, #{wh_type}, #{wh_loacation}, #{wh_phone}, #{wh_status}, #{prod_code}, #{raw_code},#{emp_num},#{wh_note})
